description: Either a borrowing of the French connaisseur ("a 'knower', one who knows") or an updating of the earlier borrowing, connoisseur, to bring it into line with modern French orthography.

entries.meaning: A specialist of a given field, especially in one of the fine arts or in a matter of taste: a connoisseur.
examples: The gallery of Prince Valsavoja contains about 100 pictures several of which deserve the attention of the artist and connaisseur.
